Package com.skopylov.retry

Interface Retry

  • public interface Retry
    Interface to perform asynchronous retry operations on supplier or runnable that may throw an exception.

    Retry.of(...) factory methods create Retry.Builder from Supplier or Runnable

    Sample usage 

          CompletableFuture<Connection> futureConnection = 
      Retry.of(() -> DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql:a:b"))
      .maxTries(100)
      .delay(1, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
      .withErrorHandler(...)
      .withExecutor(...)
      .retry();

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Retry.Builder<T>
      Retry builder to configure retry process with maxTries, delay, error handler, etc.
      static interface  Retry.ErrorHandler
      Handles errors happening during retry process.
      static class  Retry.Option
      Retry options in terms of maximum numbers of tries, delay interval and time units.
      static class  Retry.Worker<T>
      Class that actually performs asynchronous retries.

      Factory method to creates Retry.Builder for exceptional runnable.

      Factory method to creates Retry.Builder for the exceptional supplier.

      Factory method to creates Retry.Builder for runnable.

      Factory method to creates Retry.Builder for supplier.
